attributes.action: fine local councils that allow minicabs and private taxis park outside venues.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: impose fines on local councils that do not stop minicabs and private hire taxis from picking up customers off the street. the safty of the customer should come first. anyone picked up by a minicab without booking it first is not insured and therefore the council concerned is allowin an illegal practice to take place.
